title: At Home with Muhammad Ali: A Memoir of Love, Loss and Forgiveness
description: Have you ever wondered what went on behind the scenes, in the everyday private life of, arguably, the world's most famous man?To preserve his family's history, Muhammad Ali began recording a series of audio diaries in the 1970s. Drawing on these private tapes, as well as personal journals, love letters, and many never-before-seen photographs, Hana Ali (the third youngest daughter of Muhammad Ali) reflects on the complexity of her father and provides a rare glimpse inside the Ali homeâ€“where both joy and pain resided.
author: Hana Ali
